name: belue-berry
effect: No effect; only useful for planting and cooking.
short_effect: Used for creating PokéBlocks and Poffins.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
POKéBLOCK ingredient.
Plant in loamy soil
to grow BELUE.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
POKéBLOCK ingredient.
Plant in loamy soil
to grow BELUE.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A Poffin ingredient.
Bury it in soft soil to grow a
Belue Plant.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
A Poffin ingredient.
Bury it in soft soil to grow a
Belue Plant.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
In the Sinnoh region, they like to make
sweets known as Poffins with this Berry
and feed them to their Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A Berry which is very rare in the
Unova region.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
A Berry which is very rare in the
Unova region.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A Berry to be used in cooking.
This Berry is very rare and hard
to obtain in the Unova region.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
Used to make Pokéblocks that will enhance your
Beauty, this Berry is rare in other regions.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
Used to make Pokéblocks that will enhance your
Beauty, this Berry is rare in other regions.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Used to make Pokéblocks that will enhance your
Beauty, this Berry is rare in other regions.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
Used to make Pokéblocks that will enhance your
Beauty, this Berry is rare in other regions.
